tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS user_participation_data (
    user_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    forum_name VARCHAR(255),
    activity_type VARCHAR(50),
    participation_level INT,
    join_date TIMESTAMP,
    last_participation_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE user_participation (
    participation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    forum_id INT,
    activity_date DATE,
    participation_score INT
);

CREATE TABLE user_participation (
    user_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50),
    email VARCHAR(100),
    creation_date TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE forum_discussions (
    discussion_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id UUID,
    topic VARCHAR(100),
    created_at TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE group_activities (
    activity_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    activity_name VARCHAR(100),
    start_date TIMESTAMP,
    end_date TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE users (
  user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  email VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  registration_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE forums (
  forum_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  forum_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  category VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE posts (
  post_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT,
  forum_id INT,
  post_content TEXT,
  post_date TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE activities (
  activity_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT,
  activity_type VARCHAR(50),
  activity_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE Replies (
	reply_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	post_id INT REFERENCES Posts(post_id),
	user_id INT REFERENCES Users(user_id),
	reply_content TEXT NOT NULL,
	reply_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);
